gurmukhi: kop BrI rn cMf pRcMf su pRyr ky isMG DsI rn mY ]
transliteration: Kop Bdaroo Ran Channd Prachanndd Su Prer Ke Singh Dhasoo Ran Mai||
translation: Chandi in great ire penetrated into the war-arena with her lion.

gurmukhi: krvwr lY lwl kIey AirKyq lgI bVvwnl ijau bn mY ]
transliteration: Karvaar Lai Laal Kooe Arkhet Lagoo Badvaanal Jio Ban Mai||
translation: Holding her sword in her hand, she dyed the battlefield in red as if the forest is on fire.

gurmukhi: qb Gyir leI chUM Er qy dYqn ieau aupmw aupjI mn mY ]
transliteration: Tah Gher(i) Laoo Chahoon Or Te Daitan Io Oupmaa Oupjoo Man Mai||
translation: When the demons besieged the goddess from all the four sides, the poet felt like this in his mind;

gurmukhi: mn qy qn qyju cilE jgmwq kO dwmin jwn cly Gn mY ]48]
transliteration: Man Te Tan Tej(u) Chadio Jagmaat Kau Damanndi) Jaan Chale Ghan Mai||48||
translation: That the body of the mother of the world moved swifter than her mind, she appeared as lightning moving in the clouds.48.

gurmukhi: PUt geI DujnI sgrI Ais cMf pRcMf jbY kir lIno ]
transliteration: Phoot Gado Dhujnoo Sagroo As(i) Channd Prachanndd Jabai Kar(i) Loono||
translation: When the goddess held her sword in her hand, all the army of the demons cracked.

gurmukhi: dYq mrY nih byK krY bhu qau br bMf mhwN bl kIno ]
transliteration: Dait Darai Nah(i) Bekh Darai Bahu Tau Bar Band Mahaan Bal Koono||
translation: The demons were also very powerful, they did not die and instead were fighting in transformed forms.

gurmukhi: ckR clwie dieE kr qy isr sqRu ko mwr judw kir dIno ]
transliteration: Chakra Chadhaae Daio Kar Te Sir Satr(u) Ko Maar Judaa Kar(i) Doono||
translation: Chandi segregated the heads of the enemies by throwing her disc with her hands.

gurmukhi: sRaunq Dwr clI nB ko jnu sUr ko rwm jlwNjil dIno ]49]
transliteration: Sraounat Dhaar Chaloo Nabh Ko Jan(u) Soor Ko Raam Jalaanjal(i) Doono||49||
translation: Consequently the current of bloods flowed as if Rama was offering water to the sun.49.

gurmukhi: sB sUr sMGwr dey iqh Kyq mhwN br bMf prwkRm kY ]
transliteration: Sabh Soor Sanhaar Dae Tih Khet Mahaan Bar Band Praakram Kai||
translation: When that mighty goddess killed all the chivalrous demons with her power;

gurmukhi: qh sRaunq isMD BieE DrnI pir puMj igry Ais kY Dm kY ]
transliteration: Tah Sraounat Sindh Bhaeo Dharnoo Par(i) Pounj Gire As(i) Kai Dham Kai||
translation: Then so much mass of blood fell on the earth that it became a sea of blood.

gurmukhi: jgmwq pRqwp hny sur qwp su dwnv sYn geI jm kY ]
transliteration: Jagmaat Prataap Hane Sur Taap Su Daanav Sain Gado Jam Kaoo||
translation: The mother of the world, with her power, removed the suffering of gods and the demons went to the abode of Yama.

gurmukhi: bhuro Air isMDur ky dl pYT kY dwmin ijau durgw dmkY ]50]
transliteration: Bahuro Ar(i) Sindhur Ked Al Paith Kai Daamanndi) Jio Durgad Damkai||50||
translation: Then the goddess Durga glistened like lightning amongst the army of elephants.50.
